Parameters: InputStream: the input stream containing manifest data
Throws: if an I/O error has occurred
Manifest(java.io.InputStream).Description: Constructs a new Manifest from the specified input stream.

Returns: the Attributes for the specified entry name
getAttributes(java.lang.String).Description: Returns the Attributes for the specified entry name. This method is defined as: null is a valid name, when getAttributes(null) is invoked on a Manifest obtained from a jar file, null will be returned. While jar files themselves do not allow null-named attributes, it is possible to invoke @B_java#util#jar#Manifest#getEntries_E@ on a Manifest, and on that result, invoke put with a null key and an arbitrary value. Subsequent invocations of getAttributes(null) will return the just-put value. Note that this method does not return the manifest's main attributes; see @B_java#util#jar#Manifest#getMainAttributes_E@.

Returns: a Map of the entries contained in this Manifest
getEntries().Description: Returns a Map of the entries contained in this Manifest. Each entry is represented by a String name (key) and associated Attributes (value). The Map permits the null key, but no entry with a null key is created by @B_java#util#jar#Manifest#read_E@, nor is such an entry written by using @B_java#util#jar#Manifest#write_E@.

Manifest(java.util.jar.Manifest).Description: Constructs a new Manifest that is a copy of the specified Manifest.

Throws: if an I/O error has occurred
read(java.io.InputStream).Description: Reads the Manifest from the specified InputStream. The entry names and attributes read will be merged in with the current manifest entries.

clear().Description: Clears the main Attributes as well as the entries in this Manifest.

Throws: if an I/O error has occurred
write(java.io.OutputStream).Description: Writes the Manifest to the specified OutputStream. Attributes.Name.MANIFEST_VERSION must be set in MainAttributes prior to invoking this method.

Returns: the main Attributes for the Manifest
getMainAttributes().Description: Returns the main Attributes for the Manifest.

Returns: true if the specified Object is also a Manifest and has the same main Attributes and entries
Parameters: Object: the object to be compared
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Returns true if the specified Object is also a Manifest and has the same main Attributes and entries.

Returns: a shallow copy of this Manifest
clone().Description: Returns a shallow copy of this Manifest. The shallow copy is implemented as follows:

Returns: a hash code value for this object.
hashCode().Description: Returns the hash code for this Manifest.

ClassDesc: The Manifest class is used to maintain Manifest entry names and their associated Attributes. There are main Manifest Attributes as well as per-entry Attributes. For information on the Manifest format, please see the
